transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Hello, Hi, is this Mr. Sharma?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: Yes, speaking.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Yeah, hi, this is Ravi from ABC Solutions.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Do you have a minute?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: What's this about?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Well, we sell software.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: I mean, we are an IT solutions company and we thought you might be interested.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Are you looking to buy anything?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: Not really.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: I'm busy right now, actually.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Oh, okay.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: But maybe, I mean, our product could save you money.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: Probably.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: We could set a demo or something.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: What exactly does your product do?

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Well, it does a lot of things.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Helps with management, I think, and analytics.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Agent: Actually, I'm pretty new here, so I don't know all the details yet.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: Look, this isn't a good time.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: Maybe another time.

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: sure I guess

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: can I call you tomorrow

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: I'll call you if I need something

transcript.speaker: Speaker 1
transcript.text: Caller: bye
